snippet: The House vote and the Senate passage of a Democratic tax plan give the parties some political cover during an August recess.
abstract: House votes 156-171 to approve a Republican plan for a one-year extension of all the Bush-era tax cuts set to expire in January; members of both parties note that work toward a long-term budget solution will not begin until after the November elections.
lead_paragraph: The House vote and the Senate passage of a Democratic tax plan give the parties some political cover during an August recess.

headline.main: House Approves One-Year Extension of the Bush-Era Tax Cuts
headline.print_headline: House Approves One-Year Extension of the Bush-Era Tax Cuts
